explanation: [0-0] In front of a white door, a hand holds a toy gun, with the barrel pointing to the left.

[0-5] The hand fires the toy gun, and the scene switches to a man in a white T-shirt and black cap standing with his back to the camera at the door. As he is about to open the door, he is hit by the bullet. He turns around to see a young boy in a green hoodie standing by the stairs, holding a toy gun and smiling at him. The man makes an exaggerated expression and says something to the boy before opening the door and going inside.
